200.description: Return a list of non-expired sessions of the user.

get.description: Retrieve all non-expired sessions for the user, including session metadata and interaction details when available.

parameters.name: revokeGrants
parameters.description: Whether to revoke all associated grants and tokens along with the session.

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: The ID of the user whose session is to be revoked.

parameters.name: sessionId
parameters.description: The ID of the session to revoke.

delete.description: Revoke a specific user session by its ID, optionally revoking all associated grants and tokens.
